name: Jennie
bio: A trendsetter of her generation, Jennie blends effortless elegance with bold statement pieces. Frequently seen styling Fiorenzo’s structured handbags with minimalist looks, she represents modern luxury with confidence.
experience: Spotted: Paris Fashion Week Front Row

name: Taylor Swift
bio: Known for her timeless aesthetic and storytelling charm, Taylor embraces Fiorenzo’s classic leather collections for both city strolls and global tours. Her style merges vintage romance with contemporary refinement.

name: Rosé
bio: With her ethereal presence and effortless chic wardrobe, Rosé complements Fiorenzo’s soft leather silhouettes perfectly. She embodies understated sophistication and artistic expression.

name: Timothée Chalamet
bio: Celebrated for redefining red-carpet fashion, Timothée pairs Fiorenzo’s bespoke leather pieces with avant-garde tailoring. Featured in Vogue for his daring yet refined aesthetic, he represents fearless luxury.
